text: Year 25 BC was either a common year starting on Wednesday, Thursday or Friday or a leap year starting on Wednesday or Thursday of the Julian calendar. At the time, it was known as the Year of the Consulship of Augustus and Silanus. == Events == * Imperator Caesar Augustus becomes Consul for the ninth time. His partner is Marcus Junius Silanus. * The temple to Neptune on the Circus Flaminius is built * Estimation: Rome becomes the largest city of the world * Galatia becomes a Roman province * Government in China gives tributary states 20,000 rolls of silk cloth and about 20,000 pounds of silk floss. == Births == * Aulus Cornelius Celsus, author of De Medicina (d. c. AD 50) == Deaths == * King Amyntas
title: 25 BC
